text: seongseoui baegseongdeul-i geudaeegehaneullobuteo geudeul-ege seongseoleul naelyeodallago yoguhana moseege ibodadeohan yoguleul hayeo hananim-eul boyeo dallago haessdeola geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a beongaega geudeul-eul deopchyeo gass nola geudeul-eun gyesiga issneun huedo usang-eul sungbaehayeossdeola geuleom-edo hananim-eun geudeul-eul yongseohayeoss-eumyeo ttohan moseege bunmyeonghan gwonneung-eul jueoss nola
